snippet: Representative Ron Paul and former Speaker Newt Gingrich say they will continue their presidential campaigns in order to have a voice at the Republican National Convention this summer.
abstract: Representative Ron Paul and former Speaker Newt Gingrich say they will continue their presidential campaigns in order to have a voice at the Republican National Convention this summer.

headline.main: Gingrich and Paul Defy Calls to Rally Around Romney
headline.print_headline: Gingrich and Paul Defy Calls to Rally Around Romney
